cobaltCookie.name: D&D Beyond Cobalt Cookie
cobaltCookie.hint: Your D&D Beyond CobaltSession cookie value for authentication. This is stored locally and never shared.

importPath.name: Import Path
importPath.hint: The path where imported content will be stored

import.title: Import from D&D Beyond
import.content: Select the content you wish to import from D&D Beyond:

notifications.authFailed: D&D Beyond authentication failed. Please check your Cobalt cookie.
notifications.authError: D&D Beyond authentication error. See console for details.
notifications.fetchContentError: Failed to fetch content from D&D Beyond. See console for details.
notifications.fetchCharactersError: Failed to fetch characters from D&D Beyond.
notifications.noCharactersFound: No characters found on your D&D Beyond account.
notifications.importInProgress: An import is already in progress.

errors.noAuth: You must authenticate with D&D Beyond first. Please enter your Cobalt cookie in the module settings.
errors.noCookie: No Cobalt cookie available for authentication
errors.contentExists: {type} already exists and overwrite is disabled
